name: Parasityk
description:
Parasityk is a genre mesh of tower defence and top-down hack and slash, combining elements from both genres to create a unique playing experience that challenges the player’s skill and strategy in order to beat the game.

Set on a crashed ship, Captain Scrum must withstand the onslaught of a horde of parasite-infested crewmates and civilians whilst waiting for your escape pod to power on. Purchase turrets to defend your current position, upgrading them as the enemy forces get stronger, whilst also being able to slay enemies yourself as you wield a plasma sword capable of splitting parasites in half with a swing.
